snippet: In 2012, U.S. industrial production surpassed its 2006 average for the first time since the downturn began in late 2007.
lead_paragraph: In 2012, U.S. industrial production surpassed its 2006 average for the first time since the downturn began in late 2007.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: A Slow Recovery Is Better Than None
headline.main: Off the Charts: A Slow Recovery Is Better Than None
